Purpose: To detect Aspergillus (Galactomannan) antigen in serum for the diagnosis of Aspergillus infection and ensure accurate, reliable, and reproducible results.
Equipment: Galactomannan Antigen Test Kit (e.g., Bio-Rad Platelia™ Aspergillus Ag), microplate reader with 450/620–630 nm filters, incubator at 37 °C, micropipettes
